metadata.titleEn: A GNSS-based snow depth data set over northern China (GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 12h/24h, 2013-2022)
metadata.titleCn: 中国北方GNSS业务站网积雪深度数据集（GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 12h/24h, 2013-2022）
metadata.description: The GSnow-CHINA Version 1.0 data set is a long-term snow depth data set developed using observations from the two GNSS networks constructed by the China Meteorological Administration (CMA) and the China Earthquake Administration (CEA). We proposed a comprehensive framework using raw data of the complex GNSS station networks to automatically retrieve snow depth and control its quality. The data set includes snow depth of 24-hour, 12-hour, and 2-hour temporal resolutions if possible, for 80 sites from 2013 ~ 2022 over northern China (25° ~ 55° N, 70° ~ 140° E). The spatial footprint of the data set (i.e., ~1000m2) is distinguished from the current point-scale in-situ data or coarse-gridded data, which can be used as an independent data source for validation purposes. The data set is also useful for regional climate research and other meteorological and hydrological applications. The algorithm and the data files will be maintained and updated as more years of data become available in the future.
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集提供我国北方80个GNSS地基站点历史积雪深度。数据集时间跨度为2013-2022年，空间范围覆盖25° ~ 55° N/70° ~ 140° E，时间分辨率为24小时、12小时和2小时（个别站点），空间分辨率代表站点周围约1000m2。数据集基于中国气象局和中国地震局建设的用于大气水汽探测和地壳形变监测的业务站点原始观测数据研制，通过构建一套适用于复杂地基站网的自动化数据处理框架，形成各站点“分别把脉”的积雪深度估算方案。
本数据集的生产是对我国现有地基GNSS观测业务站网数据潜在应用价值的提升。数据集具有较高的时间分辨率，且空间分辨率介于地面观测和格点数据之间，可提供一种新的检验数据源，同时，数据集也可应用于气象和水文等领域的相关研究及应用分析。
metadata.instructions: The snow depth data is stored in CSV format. The name of the file is "SSSS_YYYY_HHh.txt", where SSSS represnts the site name, YYYY represents the year, and HH represents the temporal resolution. For example, hltl_2019_24h.csv represents the 24-hour snow depth file for site hltl in the year 2019.
metadata.instructionsCn: 积雪深度数据文件采用CSV格式，按站点分别存放。命名规则为SSSS_YYYY_HHh.txt。SSSS代表站点名称，YYYY代表年份，HH代表时间分辨率。例如，hltl_2019_24h.csv表示hltl站点2019年24小时分辨率的雪深数据文件。

literatureList.titleEn: A new snow depth data set over northern China derived using GNSS interferometric reflectometry from a continuously operating network (GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 2013–2022)
literatureList.referenceEn: Wan, W., Zhang, J., Dai, L., Liang, H., Yang, T., Liu, B., Guo, Z., Hu, H., and Zhao, L. (2022). A new snow depth data set over northern China derived using GNSS interferometric reflectometry from a continuously operating network (GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 2013–2022). Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 14, 3549–3571, doi: 10.5194/essd-14-3549-2022.

background: Snow cover is one of the most active elements in the cryosphere, and the maximum snow area during winter nearly occupies 50 % of the total land surface area of the Northern Hemisphere (Frei and Robinson, 1999; Armstrong and Brodzik, 2001; Robinson et al., 1993). The snow change plays a significant role in the hydrological, ecological, and climatic systems (Henderson et al., 2018). Currently, snow cover products derived from optical remote-sensing data present high accuracy (Hao et al., 2021), but snow depth products show significant uncertainties. Snow depth can be measured at point-scale using ground-based ultrasonic snow depth sensors or laser snow depth sensors, and mainly include observations from meteorological stations, snow surveys, and hydrological stations (Kinar and Pomeroy, 2015). Large-scale snow depth can be retrieved from optical, passive microwave (PMW), and active remote-sensing observations (Shi and Dozier, 2000; Guerreiro et al., 2016; Leinss et al., 2014; Che et al., 2016), yet currently operational observations have shortcomings. Optical remote sensing is affected by solar radiation and cloud (Dai et al., 2017). The PMW remote sensing has coarse spatial footprints (>25 km), and the observations saturate in deep snow (>0.8 m) (Lievens et al., 2019). Active microwave remote sensing has a long revisiting period (>20 d) and high cost (Lievens et al., 2019). The available global/hemispheric/regional snow depth data sets are mainly derived from ground observations, microwave remote sensing, model simulations, and reanalysis (Xiao et al., 2020). Previous studies also demonstrated that current snow depth data sets and snow water equivalent data sets show significant inconsistencies and uncertainties, which limit their applications in climate change projections and simulations of hydrological processes (Xiao et al., 2020; Zhang et al., 2021; Shao et al., 2022).
research objective: The two objectives of this study are (1) to propose a comprehensive framework using raw data of the complex GNSS station networks to retrieve snow depth and control its quality automatically; and (2) to produce a long-term snow depth data set over northern China (i.e., GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 12 h or 24 h, 2013–2022) using the proposed framework and historical data from 80 stations.
challenges: However, due to complex environmental and observation conditions, developing robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth data sets using observations from various GNSS station networks is still challenging.
methods: The raw GNSS data used for snow depth retrieval are the daily Receiver Independent Exchange Format (RINEX) data derived directly from individual CMA/CEA GNSS sites. The observables for snow depth retrieval, i.e., satellite pseudorandom noise (PRN) numbers, observation time, satellite elevation angle, satellite azimuth angle, pseudorange, carrier phase (CP), and signal-to-noise ratio (SNR), are extracted or calculated from the raw data. The Lomb–Scargle periodogram (LSP) analysis (Lomb, 1976) is executed on several snow-free days to determine the mean reflector heights for each GNSS satellite, each quadrant, and each GNSS frequency. A comprehensive evaluation of the quality of all the GNSS sites is done based on the data quality of the snow-free surface reflector heights in step (2), and the sites are divided into high-, medium-, and low-quality accordingly. For high- and medium-quality sites, the model for deriving daily reflector height is established, and the raw snow depth for each GNSS satellite, each quadrant, and each GNSS frequency is subsequently calculated as the difference value of the referenced height in step (2) and the height of this step. Several quality-control strategies are used to further improve the quality of the raw snow depth during the previous step, such as considering the penetration depth of soil, considering the vegetation effects, filtering of outliers, adding valid flags such as the standard error (SE) of snow depth and the number of PRNs used to calculate a specific snow depth value. Daily 24 h and sub-daily 12 h snow depths are derived for general high- and medium-quality GNSS sites, and snow depths of finer resolution are additionally derived for several GPS/GLONASS compatible sites. The GSnow-CHINA v1.0 data set is evaluated using the PMW product and the in situ measurements. The advantages and limitations of the produced data set are further analyzed to provide supportive information for future method improvement or data set extension.
dataset: The two objectives of this study are (1) to propose a comprehensive framework using raw data of the complex GNSS station networks to retrieve snow depth and control its quality automatically; and (2) to produce a long-term snow depth data set over northern China (i.e., GSnow-CHINA v1.0, 12 h or 24 h, 2013–2022) using the proposed framework and historical data from 80 stations.
findings: The data set has high internal consistency with regards to different GNSS constellations (mean r=0.98, RMSD =0.99 cm, and nRMSD (snow depth >5 cm) =0.11), different frequency bands (mean r=0.97, RMSD =1.46 cm, and nRMSD (snow depth >5 cm) =0.16), and different GNSS receivers (mean r=0.62). The data set also has high external consistency with the in situ measurements and the passive microwave (PMW) product, with a consistent illustration of the interannual snow depth variability. Additionally, the result show the potential of GNSS to derive hourly snow depth observations for better monitoring of snow disasters. The resulting GSnow-CHINA v1.0 data set is distinguished from the current point-scale in situ data or coarse-gridded data, which can be used as an independent data source for validation purposes. The data set is also useful for regional climate research and other meteorological and hydrological applications.
backgroundCn: 雪盖是冰冻圈中最活跃的元素之一，冬季的最大雪面积几乎占据北半球总陆地表面积的50%（Frei和Robinson，1999；Armstrong和Brodzik，2001；Robinson等，1993）。雪的变化在水文、生态和气候系统中发挥着重要作用（Henderson等，2018）。目前，基于光学遥感数据的雪盖产品具有较高的准确性（Hao等，2021），但雪深产品存在显著的不确定性。雪深可以通过地面超声波雪深传感器或激光雪深传感器在点尺度上进行测量，主要包括来自气象站、雪情调查和水文站的观测（Kinar和Pomeroy，2015）。大尺度雪深可以通过光学、被动微波（PMW）和主动遥感观测获取（Shi和Dozier，2000；Guerreiro等，2016；Leinss等，2014；Che等，2016），但目前的操作观测存在不足。光学遥感受太阳辐射和云层的影响（Dai等，2017）。PMW遥感具有较大的空间覆盖范围（>25公里），且在深雪（>0.8米）中观测会饱和（Lievens等，2019）。主动微波遥感的重访周期较长（>20天）且成本高（Lievens等，2019）。目前可用的全球/半球/区域雪深数据集主要来源于地面观测、微波遥感、模型模拟和再分析（Xiao等，2020）。以往研究还表明，当前的雪深数据集和雪水当量数据集存在显著的不一致性和不确定性，这限制了它们在气候变化预测和水文过程模拟中的应用（Xiao等，2020；Zhang等，2021；Shao等，2022）。
research objectiveCn: 本研究的两个目标是：(1) 提出一个综合框架，利用复杂的GNSS站网络的原始数据自动获取雪深并控制其质量；(2) 使用所提出的框架和来自80个站点的历史数据，生成一套覆盖中国北方的长期雪深数据集（即GSnow-CHINA v1.0，12小时或24小时，2013-2022年）。
challengesCn: 然而，由于复杂的环境和观测条件，利用各种GNSS站网络的观测数据开发稳健且可操作的技术以生成长期雪深数据集仍然具有挑战性。
methodsCn: 用于雪深提取的原始GNSS数据是直接从各个CMA/CEA GNSS站点获得的每日接收机独立交换格式（RINEX）数据。用于雪深提取的观测量，即卫星伪随机噪声（PRN）编号、观测时间、卫星仰角、卫星方位角、伪距、载波相位（CP）和信噪比（SNR），是从原始数据中提取或计算得出的。对多个无雪日进行Lomb-Scargle周期图（LSP）分析（Lomb，1976），以确定每个GNSS卫星、每个象限和每个GNSS频率的平均反射高度。根据无雪表面反射高度的数据质量，对所有GNSS站点进行全面评估，并将站点分为高、中、低质量。对于高质量和中质量站点，建立日反射高度的推导模型，随后计算每个GNSS卫星、每个象限和每个GNSS频率的原始雪深，作为步骤（2）中参考高度与本步骤中高度的差值。采用多种质量控制策略进一步提高原始雪深的质量，例如考虑土壤的穿透深度、考虑植被影响、过滤异常值、添加有效标志，如雪深的标准误差（SE）和用于计算特定雪深值的PRN数量。为一般高质量和中质量GNSS站点推导每日24小时和亚每日12小时的雪深，并为若干GPS/GLONASS兼容站点额外推导更细分的雪深。GSnow-CHINA v1.0数据集使用PMW产品和现场测量进行评估。进一步分析生成数据集的优缺点，以提供未来方法改进或数据集扩展的支持信息。
datasetCn: 本研究的两个目标是：(1) 提出一个综合框架，利用复杂的GNSS站网络的原始数据自动获取雪深并控制其质量；(2) 使用所提出的框架和80个站点的历史数据，生成一套覆盖中国北方的长期雪深数据集（即GSnow-CHINA v1.0，12小时或24小时，2013-2022年）。
findingsCn: 该数据集在不同GNSS星座方面具有很高的内部一致性（平均相关系数r=0.98，均方根误差RMSD=0.99 cm，雪深>5 cm时的归一化均方根误差nRMSD=0.11），在不同频段方面（平均相关系数r=0.97，均方根误差RMSD=1.46 cm，雪深>5 cm时的归一化均方根误差nRMSD=0.16），以及在不同GNSS接收器方面（平均相关系数r=0.62）也表现出高一致性。该数据集与现场测量和被动微波（PMW）产品之间具有很高的外部一致性，能够一致地展示年度间雪深的变化。此外，结果显示GNSS在获取小时级雪深观测方面的潜力，有助于更好地监测雪灾。生成的GSnow-CHINA v1.0数据集区别于当前的点尺度现场数据或粗网格数据，可以作为独立的数据源用于验证目的。该数据集对于区域气候研究以及其他气象和水文应用也具有重要价值。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can raw GNSS data be used to automatically retrieve snow depth and control its quality?
Verification.QuestionCn: 原始GNSS数据可以用于自动获取雪深并控制其质量吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is it possible for GNSS-derived snow depth data to have high consistency with in situ measurements and passive microwave products?
Verification.QuestionCn: GNSS衍生的雪深数据是否可能与现场测量和被动微波产品具有高度一致性？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is snow depth data collection more effectively achieved using ground-based ultrasonic sensors, laser sensors, or GNSS station networks?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 雪深数据收集是通过地面超声波传感器、激光传感器还是GNSS站网络更有效？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection method is used to retrieve snow depth in GNSS networks?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在GNSS网络中，用于获取雪深的数据收集方法是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are involved in producing long-term snow depth datasets using GNSS observations?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用GNSS观测数据生成长期雪深数据集面临哪些挑战？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the potential applications of the snow depth dataset over northern China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 北中国的雪深数据集的潜在应用包括：
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Validation, regional climate research, meteorological applications, hydrological applications
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 验证、区域气候研究、气象应用、水文应用

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a comprehensive framework used to automatically retrieve snow depth data from raw GNSS station network data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个综合框架的示例，用于从原始GNSS站网络数据中自动检索雪深数据？
Example.AnswerEn: The proposed framework uses raw GNSS data, such as satellite pseudorandom noise numbers, observation time, satellite elevation angle, satellite azimuth angle, pseudorange, carrier phase, and signal-to-noise ratio, to retrieve snow depth. It involves determining mean reflector heights via Lomb–Scargle periodogram analysis, evaluating site quality, deriving daily reflector heights, and employing quality-control strategies such as considering soil penetration depth and filtering outliers.
Example.AnswerCn: 该框架使用原始GNSS数据，如卫星伪随机噪声编号、观测时间、卫星高度角、卫星方位角、伪距、载波相位和信噪比，来获取雪深。它涉及通过Lomb-Scargle周期图分析确定平均反射器高度，评估站点质量，推导每日反射器高度，并采用质量控制策略，如考虑土壤穿透深度和过滤异常值。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when developing technology for long-term snow depth data collection using GNSS observations?
Example.QuestionCn: 在使用GNSS观测进行长期雪深数据收集时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge includes dealing with complex environmental and observation conditions that make it difficult to develop robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth data sets from various GNSS station networks.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是应对复杂的环境和观测条件，这使得从各种GNSS站网络中开发出稳健且可操作的技术以生成长期雪深数据集变得困难。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the feature extraction process for snow depth using GNSS station networks?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 定义使用GNSS站网进行雪深特征提取过程的特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: satellite pseudorandom noise numbers, observation time, satellite elevation angle, satellite azimuth angle, pseudorange, carrier phase, signal-to-noise ratio, mean reflector heights, quality evaluation of GNSS sites, models for deriving daily reflector height
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 卫星伪随机噪声数、观测时间、卫星仰角、卫星方位角、伪距、载波相位、信噪比、平均反射器高度、GNSS站点质量评估、推导每日反射高度的模型。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific challenges faced in developing long-term snow depth data sets from GNSS observations?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 从GNSS观测中开发长期雪深数据集面临的具体挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: robust technology, operational technology, accurate data, various GNSS station networks
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 稳健技术、操作技术、准确数据、各种GNSS站网

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes are essential for evaluating the consistency and reliability of snow depth datasets derived from GNSS data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 评估基于GNSS数据的雪深数据集的一致性和可靠性所需的基本属性有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: internal consistency across different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, receivers, external consistency with in situ measurements, passive microwave products, mean correlation, RMSD, nRMSD
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 不同GNSS星座、频段、接收器之间的一致性，与现场测量、被动微波产品的外部一致性，平均相关性，均方根误差（RMSD），归一化均方根误差（nRMSD）。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many GNSS ground stations are used to collect snow depth data over northern China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在中国北方收集雪深数据的GNSS地面站有多少个？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the temporal resolution of the snow depth dataset over northern China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 北中国雪深数据集的时间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial coverage of the GNSS snow depth dataset over northern China?
Quantification.QuestionCn: GNSS雪深数据集在中国北方的空间覆盖范围是什么？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using GNSS station networks for snow depth retrieval in meteorological research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象研究中，使用全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）站网进行雪深检索的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Using GNSS station networks for snow depth retrieval is significant because it allows for high temporal resolution data collection, covering a spatial range between ground observations and coarse-gridded data. This method enhances the potential applications of existing GNSS observation networks, providing a new data source for validation and supporting research in meteorological and hydrological fields.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用GNSS站网进行雪深获取具有重要意义，因为它允许高时间分辨率的数据收集，覆盖了地面观测与粗网格数据之间的空间范围。这种方法增强了现有GNSS观测网络的潜在应用，为验证提供了新的数据来源，并支持气象和水文领域的研究。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with developing robust technology for long-term snow depth data collection using GNSS networks?
Definition.QuestionCn: 开发用于长期雪深数据收集的GNSS网络的可靠技术面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges in developing robust technology for long-term snow depth data collection using GNSS networks include dealing with complex environmental and observation conditions, ensuring the consistency and accuracy of data across different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, and receivers, and improving operational technology to produce reliable data sets from various GNSS station networks.
Definition.AnswerCn: 使用GNSS网络进行长期雪深数据收集的技术开发面临的挑战包括应对复杂的环境和观测条件，确保不同GNSS星座、频段和接收器之间数据的一致性和准确性，以及改进操作技术，以从各种GNSS站网络中生成可靠的数据集。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the snow depth data collection method using GNSS station networks compare to optical remote sensing in terms of accuracy and consistency?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用GNSS站网收集雪深数据的方法与光学遥感在准确性和一致性方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Snow depth data collection using GNSS station networks shows high internal consistency with regards to different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, and receivers, and high external consistency with in situ measurements and PMW product. Optical remote sensing, while accurate for snow cover, presents significant uncertainties for snow depth due to solar radiation and cloud effects.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用GNSS站网进行雪深数据收集显示出不同GNSS星座、频段和接收器之间具有很高的内部一致性，并且与现场测量和被动微波产品具有很高的外部一致性。光学遥感在雪盖方面虽然准确，但由于太阳辐射和云层影响，对雪深的测量存在显著的不确定性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways does the GNSS-based snow depth retrieval framework address the limitations of existing passive microwave (PMW) and active microwave remote sensing methods?
Comparison.QuestionCn: GNSS基于的雪深检索框架在以下方面解决了现有被动微波（PMW）和主动微波遥感方法的局限性：
Comparison.AnswerEn: The GNSS-based retrieval framework offers higher temporal resolution and consistency, overcoming PMW's coarse spatial footprint and saturation in deep snow, and addressing active microwave remote sensing's long revisiting period and high cost. The GNSS approach thus provides potential for more frequent and cost-effective snow depth monitoring.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 基于GNSS的检索框架提供了更高的时间分辨率和一致性，克服了被动微波遥感在深雪中的粗糙空间足迹和饱和问题，同时解决了主动微波遥感的长重访周期和高成本。因此，GNSS方法为更频繁和具有成本效益的雪深监测提供了潜力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What potential data collection techniques could enhance the accuracy and reliability of snow depth measurements in regions with complex environmental conditions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在的数据收集技术可以提高在复杂环境条件下雪深测量的准确性和可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of raw GNSS data from complex station networks to retrieve snow depth can enhance accuracy by automatically controlling the quality through comprehensive frameworks. Techniques like Lomb–Scargle periodogram analysis and quality-control strategies such as considering soil penetration depth, vegetation effects, and filtering outliers can improve reliability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用复杂站点网络的原始GNSS数据来获取雪深可以通过综合框架自动控制质量，从而提高准确性。像Lomb-Scargle周期图分析这样的技术，以及考虑土壤穿透深度、植被影响和过滤异常值等质量控制策略，可以提高可靠性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the integration of different GNSS constellations and frequency bands influence the consistency and coverage of snow depth datasets?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同GNSS星座和频段的集成如何影响雪深数据集的一致性和覆盖范围？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integration of different GNSS constellations and frequency bands enhances internal consistency, achieving high correlation and low error margins. It improves coverage by allowing more varied and frequent observations, potentially leading to a more accurate representation of snow depth variability and better monitoring capabilities.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 不同GNSS星座和频段的集成增强了内部一致性，实现了高相关性和低误差范围。它通过允许更多样化和频繁的观测来改善覆盖，可能导致对雪深变化的更准确表示和更好的监测能力。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the use of automated frameworks in GNSS networks address challenges associated with long-term snow depth data production?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 自动化框架在全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）网络中的使用可以通过以下方式解决与长期雪深数据生产相关的挑战：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Automated frameworks allow for the systematic processing of raw GNSS data, addressing challenges by providing consistent methods for data retrieval and quality control. Such frameworks facilitate the production of long-term datasets by standardizing data handling across different stations and environmental conditions, thereby enhancing robustness and operational efficiency.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 自动化框架允许对原始GNSS数据进行系统处理，通过提供一致的数据检索和质量控制方法来应对挑战。这些框架通过在不同站点和环境条件下标准化数据处理，促进了长期数据集的生成，从而增强了稳健性和操作效率。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons that make developing robust technology for producing long-term snow depth data sets using GNSS station networks challenging?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 开发使用GNSS站网生成长期雪深数据集的可靠技术面临的挑战的潜在原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Due to complex environmental and observation conditions, developing robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth data sets using observations from various GNSS station networks is still challenging.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于复杂的环境和观测条件，利用各种GNSS站网络的观测数据开发稳健且可操作的技术以生成长期雪深数据集仍然具有挑战性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why are there significant uncertainties in current snow depth products derived from different remote sensing techniques?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 当前基于不同遥感技术的雪深产品存在显著的不确定性，原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Current snow depth products show significant uncertainties due to the limitations of different remote sensing techniques. Optical remote sensing is affected by solar radiation and cloud cover, passive microwave remote sensing has coarse spatial footprints and saturates in deep snow, and active microwave remote sensing has a long revisiting period and high cost.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 当前的雪深产品由于不同遥感技术的局限性显示出显著的不确定性。光学遥感受太阳辐射和云层覆盖的影响，被动微波遥感具有较粗的空间分辨率并且在深雪中会饱和，而主动微波遥感则具有较长的重访周期和高成本。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the high internal and external consistency of snow depth data sets derived from GNSS constellations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响由GNSS星座衍生的雪深数据集高内部和外部一致性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The high internal consistency is attributed to the agreement across different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, and receivers, while the high external consistency is due to the alignment with in situ measurements and passive microwave products, leading to a consistent illustration of interannual snow depth variability.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 高内部一致性归因于不同GNSS星座、频段和接收器之间的协议，而高外部一致性则是由于与现场测量和被动微波产品的对齐，从而一致地展示了年际雪深变异性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of developing a robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth datasets using observations from various GNSS station networks?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 开发一种强大且可操作的技术，以利用各种GNSS站网络的观测数据生成长期雪深数据集的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Developing such technology could lead to the creation of high-resolution and consistent snow depth datasets over large regions. This would enhance the accuracy of snow monitoring and forecasting, support regional climate research, and improve applications in meteorology and hydrology. Additionally, it could facilitate better monitoring of snow-related disasters by providing more frequent and reliable observations.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 开发这样的技术可以在大范围内创建高分辨率和一致的雪深数据集。这将提高雪监测和预测的准确性，支持区域气候研究，并改善气象和水文学中的应用。此外，它还可以通过提供更频繁和可靠的观测，促进对雪相关灾害的更好监测。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using raw GNSS data to retrieve snow depth and control its quality automatically?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用原始GNSS数据来获取雪深并自动控制其质量的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using raw GNSS data for snow depth retrieval and quality control can result in a comprehensive framework that provides high internal and external consistency with existing measurements. This approach can produce detailed snow depth datasets with high resolution, which are valuable for independent validation and can support various research and application fields by offering accurate and timely data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用原始GNSS数据进行雪深检索和质量控制，可以形成一个全面的框架，提供与现有测量结果高度一致的内部和外部一致性。这种方法可以生成高分辨率的详细雪深数据集，这些数据集对于独立验证非常有价值，并且可以通过提供准确和及时的数据来支持各种研究和应用领域。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of developing a comprehensive framework for retrieving snow depth from GNSS station networks?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个全面的框架以从GNSS站网络中获取雪深的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives are to propose a comprehensive framework using raw data from complex GNSS station networks to automatically retrieve snow depth and control its quality, and to produce a long-term snow depth dataset over northern China using this framework and historical data from 80 stations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是提出一个综合框架，利用复杂的GNSS站网络的原始数据自动获取雪深并控制其质量，并使用该框架和80个站点的历史数据在中国北方生成长期雪深数据集。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to address challenges in producing long-term snow depth datasets using various GNSS station networks?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么解决使用各种GNSS站网络生产长期雪深数据集中的挑战很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important because developing robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth datasets from GNSS station networks faces challenges due to complex environmental and observation conditions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 这很重要，因为从GNSS站网络开发出稳健且可操作的技术以生成长期雪深数据集面临着复杂的环境和观测条件的挑战。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of producing a snow depth dataset with high internal and external consistency using GNSS observations?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 利用GNSS观测数据生成具有高内部和外部一致性的雪深数据集的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Producing a snow depth dataset with high internal and external consistency is significant because it provides a reliable independent data source for validation, useful for regional climate research and various meteorological and hydrological applications, and highlights the potential of GNSS to derive hourly snow depth observations for better monitoring of snow disasters.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 制作具有高内部和外部一致性的雪深数据集具有重要意义，因为它提供了一个可靠的独立数据源用于验证，对区域气候研究以及各种气象和水文应用非常有用，并突显了全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）在获取每小时雪深观测方面的潜力，从而更好地监测雪灾。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key steps involved in developing a robust framework using GNSS station networks for retrieving snow depth data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 开发一个使用GNSS站网获取雪深数据的稳健框架的关键步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The process involves using raw GNSS data in the RINEX format to extract observables such as satellite pseudorandom noise numbers, observation time, satellite elevation and azimuth angles, pseudorange, carrier phase, and signal-to-noise ratio. A Lomb–Scargle periodogram analysis is executed on snow-free days to determine mean reflector heights. The quality of GNSS sites is evaluated, and sites are categorized into high-, medium-, and low-quality. For high- and medium-quality sites, a model is established to derive daily reflector height, and raw snow depth is calculated based on the difference between referenced and current heights. Quality-control strategies are employed to improve data quality, including consideration of soil penetration, vegetation effects, and filtering of outliers. Daily and sub-daily snow depths are then derived for these sites.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及使用RINEX格式的原始GNSS数据提取可观测量，如卫星伪随机噪声编号、观测时间、卫星高度和方位角、伪距、载波相位和信噪比。在无雪天进行Lomb-Scargle周期图分析，以确定平均反射器高度。评估GNSS站点的质量，并将站点分类为高、中、低质量。对于高质量和中质量站点，建立模型以推导每日反射器高度，并根据参考高度与当前高度之间的差异计算原始雪深。采用质量控制策略以提高数据质量，包括考虑土壤穿透、植被影响和异常值过滤。然后为这些站点推导每日和亚日雪深。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How does the proposed data collection method address the challenges associated with environmental and observational complexities in GNSS networks?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 所提议的数据收集方法如何解决GNSS网络中与环境和观测复杂性相关的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The proposed method addresses these challenges by automatically controlling the quality of snow depth retrievals from complex GNSS station networks. It involves a comprehensive evaluation of GNSS data quality, categorizing sites based on data quality, and applying various quality-control measures to manage environmental and observational complexities. This includes considering soil penetration depth and vegetation effects, filtering outliers, and adding valid flags, such as the standard error and number of PRNs used, to ensure high-quality data output.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 所提议的方法通过自动控制复杂GNSS站网络中雪深检索的质量来解决这些挑战。该方法涉及对GNSS数据质量的全面评估，根据数据质量对站点进行分类，并应用各种质量控制措施来管理环境和观测复杂性。这包括考虑土壤穿透深度和植被影响，过滤异常值，并添加有效标志，如标准误差和使用的PRN数量，以确保高质量的数据输出。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection methods enable the estimation of snow depth using GNSS station networks in northern China?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集方法可以利用GNSS站网在中国北方估算雪深？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using daily Receiver Independent Exchange Format (RINEX) data from GNSS sites, extracting observables like satellite pseudorandom noise numbers, observation time, satellite elevation and azimuth angles, pseudorange, carrier phase, and signal-to-noise ratio. The Lomb–Scargle periodogram analysis is used to determine mean reflector heights for snow depth estimation.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法涉及使用来自全球导航卫星系统（GNSS）站点的每日接收机独立交换格式（RINEX）数据，提取可观测量，如卫星伪随机噪声编号、观测时间、卫星高度和方位角、伪距、载波相位和信噪比。使用Lomb-Scargle周期图分析来确定反射器的平均高度，以估算雪深。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the utilization of GNSS data enhance the accuracy of snow depth measurements compared to traditional methods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: GNSS数据的利用如何提高雪深测量的准确性，相较于传统方法。
Enablement.AnswerEn: The utilization of GNSS data enhances accuracy by providing high internal consistency across different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, and receivers, and offers high external consistency with in situ measurements and passive microwave products. This method allows for capturing interannual snow depth variability more accurately than traditional methods.
Enablement.AnswerCn: GNSS数据的利用通过提供不同GNSS星座、频段和接收器之间的高内部一致性，增强了准确性，并与现场测量和被动微波产品提供了高外部一致性。这种方法能够比传统方法更准确地捕捉年际雪深变化。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges must be addressed to further develop robust technologies for snow depth data collection using GNSS networks?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了进一步开发基于GNSS网络的雪深数据收集的可靠技术，必须解决哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include dealing with complex environmental and observation conditions, ensuring data quality across various GNSS station networks, and refining quality-control strategies to handle factors like soil penetration depth, vegetation effects, and filtering outliers.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括应对复杂的环境和观测条件，确保各个GNSS站网络的数据质量，以及完善质量控制策略，以处理土壤穿透深度、植被影响和过滤异常值等因素。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could prevent the development of a robust and operational technology for producing long-term snow depth datasets using observations from various GNSS station networks?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 哪些挑战可能阻碍利用各种GNSS站网络观测数据开发出稳健且可操作的长期雪深数据集技术？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges include complex environmental conditions and diverse observation conditions across GNSS station networks. These factors make it difficult to develop technology that can consistently and accurately produce long-term snow depth datasets. Variations in site quality and the need for comprehensive data quality evaluations further complicate the process.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括复杂的环境条件和GNSS站网络中多样的观测条件。这些因素使得开发能够持续和准确地生成长期雪深数据集的技术变得困难。站点质量的差异以及对全面数据质量评估的需求进一步增加了这一过程的复杂性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be significant inconsistencies and uncertainties in current snow depth datasets and snow water equivalent datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 当前雪深数据集和雪水当量数据集中可能存在显著的不一致性和不确定性的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Current snow depth and snow water equivalent datasets may show significant inconsistencies and uncertainties due to varying methodologies in data collection and retrieval, limitations in remote sensing technologies, and the inherent challenges in accurately measuring snow depth and water content. These inconsistencies can affect climate change projections and hydrological simulations.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 当前的雪深和雪水当量数据集可能由于数据收集和检索方法的差异、遥感技术的局限性以及准确测量雪深和水分含量的固有挑战而显示出显著的不一致性和不确定性。这些不一致性可能会影响气候变化预测和水文模拟。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using GNSS station networks for snow depth retrieval in terms of accuracy and operational challenges?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用GNSS站网进行雪深获取的有效性，包括准确性和操作挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using GNSS station networks for snow depth retrieval is effective because it produces a data set with high internal consistency across different GNSS constellations and frequency bands. However, there are challenges due to complex environmental and observation conditions that need to be addressed to develop robust and operational technology for long-term data set production.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用GNSS站网进行雪深提取是有效的，因为它产生了在不同GNSS星座和频段之间具有高内部一致性的数据集。然而，由于复杂的环境和观测条件，仍然存在挑战，需要解决这些问题以开发出稳健的、可操作的技术，以便长期数据集的生产。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In the context of enhancing snow depth monitoring, how significant is the role of quality control strategies when utilizing GNSS data for dataset creation?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在增强雪深监测的背景下，质量控制策略在利用GNSS数据创建数据集时的重要性有多大？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Quality control strategies are significant in enhancing snow depth monitoring with GNSS data. They involve addressing factors like soil penetration depth, vegetation effects, and filtering outliers, which are crucial for improving the raw snow depth data quality and ensuring reliable dataset creation for applications in meteorology and hydrology.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 质量控制策略在增强GNSS数据的雪深监测中具有重要意义。它们涉及解决土壤渗透深度、植被影响和过滤异常值等因素，这对于提高原始雪深数据质量和确保为气象和水文学应用创建可靠数据集至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't understand how raw GNSS data is transformed into a reliable snow depth estimate over time.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解原始GNSS数据是如何转化为可靠的雪深估计的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The raw GNSS data used for snow depth retrieval are the daily Receiver Independent Exchange Format (RINEX) data derived directly from individual GNSS sites. The observables such as satellite pseudorandom noise (PRN) numbers, observation time, satellite elevation angle, satellite azimuth angle, pseudorange, carrier phase (CP), and signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) are extracted or calculated from the raw data. A Lomb–Scargle periodogram (LSP) analysis is executed on several snow-free days to determine the mean reflector heights, which is used to calculate snow depth as the difference between referenced height and the height obtained during snow presence.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 用于雪深提取的原始GNSS数据是直接从各个GNSS站点获得的每日接收机独立交换格式（RINEX）数据。观测量包括卫星伪随机噪声（PRN）编号、观测时间、卫星仰角、卫星方位角、伪距、载波相位（CP）和信噪比（SNR），这些数据从原始数据中提取或计算得出。对多个无雪日进行Lomb-Scargle周期图（LSP）分析，以确定平均反射高度，这用于计算雪深，即参考高度与雪存在时获得的高度之间的差值。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm not sure why creating long-term snow depth datasets from GNSS networks poses challenges.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定为什么从GNSS网络创建长期雪深数据集会面临挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Developing robust and operational technology to produce long-term snow depth datasets using observations from various GNSS station networks is challenging due to complex environmental and observation conditions. The data quality varies significantly, requiring quality-control strategies to ensure accurate snow depth estimation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 利用各种GNSS站网络的观测数据开发稳健的运营技术以生成长期雪深数据集是具有挑战性的，因为环境和观测条件复杂。数据质量差异显著，需要质量控制策略以确保雪深估计的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how a dataset of snow depth can be both high-resolution and suitable for regional climate applications.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白一个雪深数据集如何既可以是高分辨率的，又适合区域气候应用。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The dataset provides high temporal resolution with 12-hour and 24-hour intervals and a spatial resolution that represents an area of about 1000m² around each station. This makes it suitable for regional climate research and offers a new source for validation purposes, bridging the gap between point-scale in situ data and coarse-gridded datasets.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该数据集提供了高时间分辨率，具有12小时和24小时的间隔，以及代表每个站点周围约1000平方米区域的空间分辨率。这使其适合区域气候研究，并为验证目的提供了新的数据来源，弥补了点尺度现场数据与粗网格数据集之间的差距。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss the challenges in developing robust technology for producing long-term snow depth datasets using GNSS station observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 讨论使用GNSS站点观测数据开发长期雪深数据集的技术挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges in developing robust technology for producing long-term snow depth datasets using GNSS station observations stem from complex environmental and observation conditions. These include ensuring consistency and accuracy in variable weather and terrain conditions, managing the variability of GNSS signals, and handling the diverse range of data quality across different GNSS sites. Additionally, integrating and harmonizing data from different GNSS constellations, frequency bands, and receivers to maintain high internal and external consistency presents significant technical hurdles.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 开发用于生成长期雪深数据集的稳健技术，面临着复杂的环境和观测条件带来的挑战。这些挑战包括在多变的天气和地形条件下确保一致性和准确性，管理GNSS信号的变异性，以及处理不同GNSS站点之间数据质量的多样性。此外，整合和协调来自不同GNSS星座、频段和接收器的数据，以保持高水平的内部和外部一致性，也带来了显著的技术难题。
